body_text:
It's from 388cbec, which I believe got merged before we decided to do reviews on Github and bulk-commit changes to mozilla-central, but we didn't make the bug for it in time before that decision was made. So it'll have to get your review, at which point you'd probably note something like how I missed adding it to the list of modules to unload. :P
If you want, we can just do comments directly on that commit and I'll make a PR with feedback fixes. How does that sound?
body:
It's from https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/commit/388cbecf2c8534fea0c9cd8786449c3891ceee08, which I believe got merged before we decided to do reviews on Github and bulk-commit changes to mozilla-central, but we didn't make the bug for it in time before that decision was made. So it'll have to get your review, at which point you'd probably note something like how I missed adding it to the list of modules to unload. :P

If you want, we can just do comments directly on that commit and I'll make a PR with feedback fixes. How does that sound?
body_html:
It's from 388cbec, which I believe got merged before we decided to do reviews on Github and bulk-commit changes to mozilla-central, but we didn't make the bug for it in time before that decision was made. So it'll have to get your review, at which point you'd probably note something like how I missed adding it to the list of modules to unload. :P

If you want, we can just do comments directly on that commit and I'll make a PR with feedback fixes. How does that sound?
